text: not even three miles not even a mile
across from the city since this site but
you do here and you do feel upon the
approach of that island that there's
something under that crust that is
yearning to resurface
very first time that I went to the
island the approach was unreal every now
and then you might get a glimpse of a
Department of Corrections truck with the
prisoners is that the right one to care
for my daughter who died from still
birth
this is an enlargement of a photograph
we took of an open-mouth grave for
infants and you can see in the
background these are the markers so each
one of these markers is a thousand
babies the people buried there are
families who were not properly informed
as to what it means to agree to a city
burial god forbid if I died without
knowledge or identification to others
I'd most probably end up here and I
truly believe that my soul would be very
lovely with a voice from some living
soul to let me rest in peace instead of
just a hole in hell
